cmp: 匕 (an ancient type of spoon, dagger/ladle)

exm.mng: a cake of tea, commonly Pu'er tea 普洱茶[Pu3 er3 cha2], compacted into a bowl or nest shape, dome shaped tea-brick, caked tea
source of Changjiang or Yangtze river
a flood of tears and mucus, broken-hearted and weeping bitterly
source of Changjiang or Yangtze river
